title: For LCS April fool joke Please Broadcast Bronze 5 games
body:
and let the commentator comment on them xD.

Here is an exemple with wowcrendor and playerpov :D.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8by1FG_Mos

replies.body: I think the shoutcasters shouldn't know it's a bronze game. Just tell them to comment on it.
Yes. Everybody upvote him

Didn't they already broadcast team coast vs team dignitas twice in the lcs :3

lol i'm joking (~'-')~
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/47181165.jpg
Am I the only guy thinking that if he had actually just fired that gun that he would never have children?
Look at him. Something tells me he isn't having children anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uPtudH3P,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-04-01T17:29:10.108+0000)
>
> Am I the only guy thinking that if he had actually just fired that gun that he would never have children?

Yes, because the barrel is pointing away from him.
You must have never used a shotgun in your life. He's holding it in front of his crotch and if he fired it it would be like a mule just kicked him in the balls.
Oh, didn't look close enough to notice where it was resting.  I thought it was off to the side of his leg.

[NOTE: No offense to people in Bronze, I know most people aren't this bad]

AND HE HITS THE MAGE MINION WITH THE SPEAR! I mean it would have been better to hit his lane opponent, but he tired- OH AND HE'S TOWER DIVING AT LEVEL 2 AND THAT'S GOING TO BE FIRST BLOOD FOR RE- oh he got executed. Well. I mean. I guess he can farm easier now so...

***MEANWHILE***

AND BLITZ LANDS THE HOOK ON TO THE AMUMU AND THAT'S A 5 MAN AMUMU ULT RIGHT THERE! OH IT'S GOING GREAT FOR RED TEAM AND LUCIAN IS-... Just. Just standing there. Not even doing anything. Kassadin is dead. Flash-Rift walked into the tower... Oh... Sona missed her ult and uh... Well blue team has aced red team now so... I guess they'll push for the win- oh no they're going for Baron. It doesn't seem like a good idea they're all low on health and........ And the remaining members of blue team has died to Baron...
as a bronzie, i can confirm this
At least it's no yawn-fest like the LC$ games. Like I'm not even joking.
Just watch UOL games they are 10 times more exciting then any other team.

It doesn't seem like a good idea they're all low on health and........ 

Rivington voice:
And TEEMO WAS STEALTHED AND GOES FOR THE 1V5, EASY DOUBLE KILL,HE SOON REALISES Hes outnumbered and flees,smartest move all game,and the chase is on! teemo makes a beeline for his tower,BUT LOOK HES BEEN ULTED BY SEJUANI,IT LOOKS LIKE THE END near BUT IS OT OH! OH! THE MUSHROOM! JINX MAINTAINS THE CHASE,LOOKING FOR THE ULTIMATE AND ANOTHER MUSHROOM! A QUADRAKILL FOR TEEMO WITH ONLY 100 HEALTH REMAINING,BUT LOOK ITS BLITZCRANK FLASHING INTO THE TWO NEXUS TOWERS,HE GOES FOR THE HOOK,**HE MISSES! ** PENTAKILL!!! OH MY GOD! NURF TEEMO! THE TOP LANE TELEPORT BACKDOOR IS ON,AND IT LOOKS LIKE GG FOLKS! What a turn around! It looks like teemo typed in his twitch stream info,stating that he is a...Diamond streamer? Wait,what elo is this? hes smurfing in bronze?
That would be low of Riot for doing something like this. As much as I'd love it, they are essentially insulting there player base if they did.

They wouldn't use random people in bronze 5 they would probably just get 2 teams probably youtubers who are pretty bad at the game to play for a fun and a bit of money on the side. Not really an insult to anyone. Kinda like lord of the arena in hearthstone if you've seen that. A lot of the players in that torument were league of legends players as well. Like Oddone who wiped the floor with everyone and SivHD who was the worst player I've ever seen in hearthstone but he obviously was doing it purely for fun and wasn't being serious at all.
They might do it with the Bronze LCS folks.

Just take a poll of all members of bronze V:

*A message to all bronze V players! This is your chance to advance out of "elo hell" and proceed to games where there are no smurfs, trolls, ragers, afks, etc. You think bad teammates are holding you down? Deserve to be in challenger? Well wait no longer, for you can sign up right here for a LCS debut in front of the entire LCS crowd! Sign up now!*
I'd do it in a heartbeat.

> [{quoted}](name=alcatrazEscapee,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uPtudH3P,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-03-31T16:25:05.783+0000)

Well wait no longer, for you can sign up right here for a LCS debut in front of the entire LCS crowd! Sign up now!*

this is sooo vvortic, "elo hell my team too toxin i deserve challenjour gg"
It would so work.
like how they insult our inteligence when they tell us this game is very well balanced?

> [{quoted}](name=Yutaji,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uPtudH3P,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-31T13:49:25.361+0000)
>
> That would be low of Riot for doing something like this. As much as I'd love it, they are essentially insulting there player base if they did.

they could easily find 10 volunteers in the millions of bronzies :D (like me!)

I am not even insult. That's pretty funny. XD

 I have my bad games too as I can miss all my spells for no reason. When I began playing League of Legends I could barely move my champion correctly. lol Now, I am way better. I didn't finish my placements yet because I don't have the time and when I have the game is lagging a lot. I know tough that I am a Bronze player. I don't play enough to be Gold or Platinum or even better and I probably miss coordination between the mouse and the keyboard.

Tough, I have seen so many fun situations in my games. This week, for example, the epic chases that my team were doing. XD''' It was pretty clear that pushing was the better idea.

Maybe our bronze games are funnier and less boring than the LCS ones. (As one comment says) Maybe a thing to be proud off. Tough, for myself, I am proud when I improve.

P.S.: Sorry for grammar mistakes, I talk french.
I'm bronze and I would volunteer for this.
I would totally watch phreak and montecristo shout casting a bronze V game.

I can see it now....

Montecristo: "I'm not sure what I'm watching here, there are no bronze players in Korea. The lowest elo I've ever seen is high platinum."

there should just be a bronze LCS. the money made would be legendary...
...unlike the bronze plays

> [{quoted}](name=MT Skjar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uPtudH3P,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-03-31T16:41:50.186+0000)
>
> http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/47181165.jpg
I logged on to upvote because that sounds very fun to watch.
The point of an April Fools joke is they do something spontaneous and weird, so suggesting what to do won't work. I think it might be something fun to watch as long as names aren't shown.
If you want to see that just watch APlatypuss when he is streaming Bronzodia.
HELLOEVERYONETHISISHTOTHEHUSKYHUSKYBACKFORSOMEMORE BROOOOOOOOONZE LEEEEEEEEEEAGUE HEEEEEEERROOOOOOOOES!!!!
I would love to watch bronze gameplay. With or without commentary. No joke.

The problem with "Bronze" tournaments and anything that's "the best of the worst" is a smurf could easily throw games to get into a bronze tournament just to dominate there. 

"Up the Down Steroid" South Park Episode
BRONZE LEAGUE HEROESSSSSS
Im making a smurf don't lie
That would be gr8
Stream even through like G4. They all look the same to me.
It's weird... I'm "bronze" and I never play this terribly...
Replace the actual summoner names with those of TSM and C9 players, and confuse the shoutcasters.

i'm in bronze and i would love to volunteer for this
time to show off my bronze zed mechanics

1. thats child labor
2. you need to be atl 13 to play league
3. they dont have enough money to pay for how much they will be fined
Uh, aplatypuss alaready does that on his twitch stream.. he streams games under 100MMR.. Calls it Bronzodia.
is even possible to get mmr that low, im in bronze 5 and have like 900
Yes
i support this, maybe then gold and silver players would realise that they are just as bad as bronze Vs
